title: Default Vehicle Icons Not Loading in Events (Fixed: Aug 10, 2025) - v1.9.9
resolution: The `schedule.js` file was incorrectly referencing a non-existent stock image file (`stock-car.png`). The code has been updated to use the `createVehicleIcon` utility function, which dynamically generates the correct SVG placeholder and ensures it is clickable.

title: Edit Event Modal Save Button Inoperative (Fixed: Aug 10, 2025) - v1.9.6
resolution: The 'Edit Event' modal was missing the multi-select dropdown for checklists, which caused the JavaScript to fail when trying to access it. The missing HTML element has been added, and the associated event listeners in `schedule.js` now function correctly.
